text: "Story of My Life" is a 2013 song by English-Irish boy band One Direction and is the second single from their third studio album Midnight Memories. It topped the single charts in Denmark, Ireland, Lebanon, New Zealand and Spain. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Belgium, Canada, Greece, Israel, Italy, Japan, the Netherlands, Poland, South Africa, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. Category:2013 songs Category:One Direction songs
title: Story of My Life (One Direction song)
